data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 7,069 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Tasman.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tasman, New Zealand
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Tasman, New Zealand to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Tasman.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Tasman.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Shaikh people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Tasman, New Zealand. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Tasman.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Tasman, New Zealand has a population of 40,000.

We estimate Tasman has 7,069 people who might know Jesus, 13,349 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 19,581 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 7,069 believers in Tasman to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests
